longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Germany must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Germany. (SEE NOTE 56350) 
    NOTE 56350: Not applicable when traveling to the Faroe
   Isl. or Greenland. 
- Holders of a German Travel Permit Issued in Lieu of Passport
  ("Reiseausweis als Passersatz"), accompanied by an expired
  German passport or expired German National ID card.
- Holders of a German child's travel document in lieu of
  passport (Kinderausweis).

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Germany will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Germany are expected to hold
  their own travel document
